name: Espurr

evolution.description: Espurr can evolve into Meowstic at level 7 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 12 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Restraint Pokémon. The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: This Pokémon ignores disadvantage when it relates to sight.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: This Pokémon bypasses Light Screen, Reflect, Substitute, Mist, Safeguard, and Aurora Veil.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to becoming confused.
